events.name: construct
events.pointcut_raw: ( call(InetSocketAddress.new(int)) || call(InetSocketAddress.new(InetAddress, int)) || call(InetSocketAddress.new(String, int)) || call(* InetSocketAddress.createUnresolved(String, int)) ) && args(.., port)

raw_lines: RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "The specified port " + port + " is out of range; [0 ~ 65535]");
